experience: You and Lisa both know Peter Reno, Diana Cheng-Lau, and 15 others

Hicks Professional Group provides IT Staffing to a wide range of federal, state and commercial clients. Our Small Business (SBE), Disabled Veteran Business Enterprise (DVBE) and Service Disabled Veteran Owned Small Business (SDVOSB) certifications allow us to provide solutions for clients looking to expand their DVBE diversity spend.Hicks Professional Group has been in business for 35 years and became certified as a DVBE in 2008, two years after current President, Darren Hicks, joined the company.  A decorated former Navy Seal who served in Operation Enduring Freedom in Afghanistan after 9/11, Darren's leadership, focus and adherence to Navy SEAL core values sets the bar high for Hicks Professional Group, as is evidenced by the commitment of our staff and consultants to provide first class solutions to each client and agency.We have a fun working environment and believe in a work/life balance, which is why we have a low rate of attrition compared to the industry standard. Promoted to Vice President, Client Services.  Collaborate with the President/CEO to build the business through planning and delivering greater value to our clients, customers and partners.  Responsible for revenue growth, profitability, new business, and developing partnerships.  Manage the day to day operations and lead and develop our employees.
Vice President of Human Resources, Operations, and Administration
Promoted to Vice President of Human Resources, Operations and Administration as a strategic partner and forward thinking executive to reorganize and build our sales and recruiting team.

In 2001, I joined the inaugural Board of Directors of Mt. Diablo Soccer Club as a volunteer where we began a non-profit, competitive soccer league in Clayton, California.  Always having a passion for working with youth and families, I wanted to support my community and make a positive impact on the lives I touched.  I worked with Mt. Diablo Soccer Club as a Board Member and also with CYSA District IV and CYSA North performing various volunteer duties and participating on various committees.  Each year, we worked together as a Board to grow the club and in 2007; we had more than 35 competitive teams.  In 2008, through a strategic merger, Diablo Futbol Club was formed as a competitive youth soccer organization through the merger of Diablo Valley Soccer Club (founded in 1991) and Mt. Diablo Soccer League (founded 2001).
Director of Human Resources and Administration

In 1998, I joined Hicks’ executive leadership team as the first ever Director of Human Resources and Administration to offer my diverse experience in managing human resources, contracts, and administration and strong business acumen.  As a member of the executive leadership team, I am responsible for working with the owner and key executives to develop strategic priorities, objectives, operating plans, and budgets as well as to build and lead human resources.  As the Director of Human Resources and Administration, I am responsible for planning, managing, directing, and overseeing all facets of human resources, contracts, and administration.
Human Resources, Contracts and Administrative Management

Cardno ENTRIX is an environmental and natural resource management consultancy providing a broad suite of services in Water Resources Management, Natural Resources Management, Permitting & Compliance, and Liability Management. At Cardno ENTRIX, I grew in parallel with the rapid growth of the company.  I functioned as the West Coast Administrative Manager, the first Human Resources specialist for the firm, and the Manager of Contracts Administration.  Developed the firm’s original Affirmative Action Plan, Employment Handbook, Hiring Guidelines, and drug testing program in response to the oil and pipeline industries’ requirements.  Developed and implemented all of the hiring guidelines, policies and procedures to support the companies AAP and successfully trained all senior management and managers on the program.  Successfully managed a detailed federal and state audit, both of which we passed successfully.   I worked with Senior Staff to prepare RFPs and coordinate projects and staff.

summary: Leadership Executive with more than 20 years of experience in client services, managing human resources, contracts, operations, administration and staff.Creative thinker with intense focus on goal achievement.  Increase revenues with an emphasis on the consultative approach to winning business.  Skilled negotiator who focuses on win-win profitable solutions.  Ability to prioritize and manage multiple customers, partners, projects and prospects.  Extremely conscientious and thorough and bring a tremendous amount of energy to the workplace. Anticipate issues before they become problems and ably manage a variety of options to come up with the most practical and appropriate solution.  Effectively deal with very strong personalities with diverse opinions yet successfully influence the outcome to balance competing priorities.
